bind.calculate: if( ../health_card ='yes',' or is the date of birth on the vaccination card','')

bind.relevant: ../dobknown ='yes' and ( ../dob_month ='1' or ../dob_month ='3' or ../dob_month ='5' or ../dob_month ='7' or ../dob_month ='8' or ../dob_month ='10' or ../dob_month ='12')

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Age in months must be between 0 - 23 months

bind.calculate: if( ../inHome ='no','',if( ../childPresent ='no' and /data/building_type ='multi','Thank the person for their time and explain we are only looking for flats/dwellings where children under 2 years of age permanently live.',if( ../childPresent ='no' and /data/building_type ='single','Thank the person for their time and explain we are only looking for houses where children under 2 years of age permanently live.','Thank the person for their time.')))

bind.relevant: ../../inHome ='no' or ( ../../inHome ='yes' and ../../adultPresence ='no') or ( ../../inHome ='yes' and ../../adultPresence ='yes' and ../../childPresent ='no') or ( ../../inHome ='yes' and ../../adultPresence ='yes' and ../../childPresent ='yes' and ../../motherPresent ='no') or ( ../../inHome ='yes' and ../../adultPresence ='yes' and ../../childPresent ='yes' and ../../motherPresent ='yes' and ../../consent ='yes')

bind.calculate: if( ../finalflat ='no','You have finished the questionnaire for this flat/dwelling. Go on to the next flat/dwelling.','You have finished the questionnaire for this multi-family dwelling. Go to the next building.')

select1.label: What type of building is this?

item.label: Not a dwelling (examples: store, abandoned building, factory, etc.)

input.label: Record GPS coordinates of this building
input.hint: Ensure clear sky for better accuracies

input.label: GPS recording ism. Accuracy should be greater than 0m and less than 5m - Please recapture the GPS coordinates.

input.hint: All interviewers entering the same building should record the SAME building name.

input.hint: We may come back later to talk with an adult. What is the name of the head of household.
